version_description:
- Undo dice rolls 5 times in a game using gems.
- Get gems by playing Lucky Dice with friends.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Major Update
- Make TEAM and play TEAM UP
- Change name and choose Avatars from list of available avatars (FREE)
- See friends who are online in the game
- Invite people to Private/Team Up matches with link also
- Play as Team in Private Table as well
- Disable Undo if you don't want to wait for 2 secs
- On disconnect, turn is played AUTO to avoid kicking out (Turn it OFF when you reconnect)
- Report bad behaviour
- UI Improvements
- Crash fixes
- Performance improvements

# 1.3
- Crash fixes
- Performance improvements
- Language support for : Bahasa Indonesian, Hindi, French and Portuguese
-----------------------------------------------
# 1.2
- Play TEAM vs TEAM mode
- Change name and choose game avatars
- See friends who are online
- Play as team in Private Table
- Report bad behaviour
- On disconnect, turn is played AUTO to avoid kicking out (Turn it OFF when you reconnect)
- UI Improvements

Update
* Win Gems by participating in Contest
* Chat rules and regulations

Update: 1.0.21 (17th May 2017)
- Offline mode added
- Bug Fixes
- Earn free Gold from Ads

- Fix the chat sending problem
- Improved game speed
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements

- League Competition
- Country Flags
- Levelling Improvement
- Graphics Improvement
- Bug Fixes
- Performance Improvement

- Fix chat problem
- Fix Ads Video problem
- Fix stuck at loading
- Turn on/off in-game notification
- Mute Chat if you don't want
- Edit country manually
- See Last Week League Result
- Bet amount in challenge
- Urdu Language support
- In-game Notification stuck problem solved
- UI/UX Improvements
- Bug Fixes

- Bet higher and win higher. Now play with 5m and 10m bets
- Play Team Up: Quick & Master Variations
- Make Friends inside game, add players as 'Game Buddy'
- View profile of your Friends and League group members
- Arabic Language Support
- Read FAQs for general problems
- New setting to hide your online status
- UI/UX Improvements
- Many bug fixes
- Bug fixes
Important Crash Fixes for the last update

Update:
- Biggest Ludo Star Update Ever!
- Win Games and Get Special Chests
- Collect Dice Faces from the Chests
- Send Gifts to a friend while playing the game
- Complete your Dice Collection and win Gems
- Important Security Fixes
- Reward Box: Watch Ads to win gems now!
- Friend List Search Made Easy: Sorted by Name
- A lot of Bug Fixes and Performance improvements
- iPhone X UI/UX improvement
Important Crash Fixes for the last update
- Bug fixes
- Bug Fixes

Major Update:
- Multiple UI changes
- Play Team Up with Random teammates
- Apple sign-in support
- Performance improvements, bug fixes and more!

- New Dices
- Double Undo: Use undo again after first undo
- Play Team Up with Random teammates
- Performance improvements, bug fixes and more!

- Fixes for Double Undo
- Added Arabic language support
